summary: Chen-Ning Franklin Yang , also known as Yang Zhenning, is a Chinese-born American physicist and mathematician.
full_text: When the Second Sino-Japanese War broke out between China and Japan in 1937, Peking University, Tsinghua University and Nankai University, merged to form Changsha Temporary University in Changsha, and later National Southwestern Associated University  in Kunming. After the war, the universities moved back and resumed their operation.
title: National Southwestern Associated University
